titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the publication "To Stand Against Agression: Milosevic, the Bosnian Republic, and the Conscience of the West".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/4/1993--Introduced. Requires that an additional 250 copies of the publication entitled "To Stand Against Aggression: Milosevic, the Bosnian Republic, and the Conscience of the West" be printed for the Committee on Foreign Relations.
